DataSet¶

class model.dataSet.DataSet(structure: model.component.DataStructureDefinition, describedBy: Optional[model.component.DataFlowDefinition] = None, dataset_attributes: Optional[dict] = None, attached_attributes: Optional[dict] = None, data=None)¶

Bases: object

An organised collection of data.

Parameters

  • structure (class:DataStructureDefinition) – Associates the DataStructureDefinition to the DataSet

  • describedBy (class:DataFlowDefinition) – Associates the DataFlowDefinition to the Dataset

  • dataset_attributes (dict) – Contains all the attributes from the DataSet class of the Information Model

  • attached_attributes (dict) – Contains all the attributes at a Dataset level

  • data (Pandas Dataframe) – Any object compatible with pandas.DataFrame()

property attachedAttributes¶

Contains all the attributes at a Dataset level with NoSpecifiedRelationship

check_DA_keys(attributes: dict, setID: str)¶

Inputs default values to the dataset_attributes in case they are missing

Parameters

  • attributes (dict) – A dictionary with dataset_attributes

  • setID (str) – Provides an identification of the data set.

property data¶

Pandas DataFrame that withholds all the data

property datasetAttributes¶

Contains all the attributes from the DataSet class of the Information Model

Class

dict

property describedBy¶

Associates the DataFlowDefinition to the Dataset

Class

DataFlowDefinition

property dimAtObs¶

Extracts the dimensionAtObservation from the dataset_attributes

readCSV(pathToCSV: str)¶

Loads the data from a CSVCheck the Pandas read_csv docs

Parameters

pathToCSV (str) – Path to CSV file

readExcel(pathToExcel: str)¶

Loads the data from a Excel file. Check the Pandas read_excel docs

Parameters

pathToExcel (str) – Path to Excel file

readJSON(pathToJSON: str, orient: str = 'records')¶

Loads the data from a JSON with orientation as records. Check the Pandas read_json docs

Parameters

  • pathToJSON (str) – Path to JSON file

  • orient (str) – Orientation of the file

semanticValidation()¶

Performs a Semantic Validation on the Data.

Returns

A list of errors as defined in the Validation Page.

setDimensionAtObservation(dimAtObs)¶

Sets the dimensionAtObservation :param dimAtObs: Dimension At Observation :type dimAtObs: str

property structure¶

Associates the DataStructureDefinition to the DataSet

Class

DataStructureDefinition

toCSV(pathToCSV: Optional[str] = None)¶

Parses the data to a CSV file with comma separation and no header or index

Parameters

pathToCSV (str) – Path to save as CSV file

toFeather(pathToFeather: str)¶

Parses the data to an Apache Feather format

Parameters

pathToFeather (str) – Path to Feather file

toJSON(pathToJSON: Optional[str] = None)¶

Parses the data using the JSON Specification from the library documentation

Parameters

pathToJSON (str) – Path to save as JSON file

toXML(message_type: SDMXThon.utils.enums.MessageTypeEnum = <MessageTypeEnum.StructureDataSet: 'StructureDataSet'>, outputPath: str = '', id_: str = 'test', test: str = 'true', prepared: Optional[datetime.datetime] = None, sender: str = 'Unknown', receiver: str = 'Not_supplied', prettyprint=True)¶

Parses the data to SDMX-ML 2.1, specifying the Message_Type (StructureSpecific or Generic or Metadata)

Parameters

  • message_type (MessageTypeEnum) – Format of the Message in SDMX-ML

  • outputPath (str) – Path to save the file, defaults to ‘’

  • id (str) – ID of the Header, defaults to ‘test’

  • test (str) – Mark as test file, defaults to ‘true’

  • prepared (datetime) – Datetime of the preparation of the Message, defaults to current date and time

  • sender (str) – ID of the Sender, defaults to ‘Unknown’

  • receiver (str) – ID of the Receiver, defaults to ‘Not_supplied’

  • prettyprint (bool) – Saves the file formatted to be human readable

Returns

StringIO object, if outputPath is ‘’
